thread.section_title: Car Mats UK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Car Mats UK | www.carmats-uk.com
thread.title: Sue G Smith
thread.title_full: Car Mats UK reviewed by Sue G Smith

author: Sue G Smith
title: Sue G Smith
text: The car mats are brilliant, they fit my car perfectly and the blue edging exactly matches the interior . I am very pleased with them, they were quick and easy to order the exact ones I wanted and I received them quickly. Very friendly helpful responses to emails. Recommended 5*** service
